description:
To celebrate my 1 year anniversary I'm streaming for 12 hours! I'll be streaming a bunch of different things, with karaoke at the end (separate stream)! Check the schedule here: https://twitter.com/ceresfauna/status/1562638793647071233

✿ Artist Credits ✿
Thumbnail: https://twitter.com/tangdou0402/status/1560256289187721216
Thank you so much!! 💚

All Rights Reserved.
This game is being streamed and monetized after confirming with Epic Games.
This game is being streamed and monetized after confirming with Ubisoft, which is based on the following Ubisoft Video Policy (https://www.ubisoft.com/en-us/videopolicy.html) 
This game is being streamed and monetized after confirming with © Jackbox Games.
This game is being streamed and monetized after confirmation with Red Barrel Games.
https://redbarrelsgames.com/

༻━━━༺ .⋅ ✧ ⋅. ༻━━━༺

【 FauForest Rules! 】

► Be kind and respectful to everyone here! Don’t spam or troll.
► If you see spam or trolling, don’t respond. Just block, report, and ignore those comments. 
► Talk about the stream, but please don’t bring up unrelated topics or have personal conversations.
► Don’t bring up other streamers or streams unless I mention them first.
► Similarly, don’t talk about me or my stream in other streamers’ chat.
► Try your best not to backseat. I like to enjoy games at my own pace, and I think part of the fun is watching me struggle, so please refrain from offering advice unless I specifically ask for help!

As long as you follow the rules above, you can chat in any language.

༻━━━༺ .⋅ ✧ ⋅. ༻━━━༺
